name: Pistachio Nuts Isolated
description: Casual styling and precious details come, together in this stretch cotton ribbed jersey top. The cropped silhouette pairs perfectly with the casual feel of ribbing, while the deep V-neck is enriched with an embroidery of fine rows of precious monili, completing the look of the top with a very feminine sparkling note.
